item.title: Water.css 为简单而生的 css 框架
item.description: 来源 https://github.com/kognise/water.css 官方Demo https://watercss.netlify.com Water.css Water.css is a just-add-css collection of styles to make simple websites like this just a little bit nicer. Get it already! Now you can write your simple static site with nice semantic html, and Water.css will manage the styling for you. Goals Responsive Good code quality Good browser support Small size (< 2kb) Beautiful No classes
